summary:
Add a handsome follower named Damius - a battle-worn Nord mercenary to your group!
Two-Handed Berserk fight-style. Essential also.
Standalone follower no replacer. Uses whichever body you have installed.
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[img]http://oi50.tinypic.com/34qlhmb.jpg[/img]
[b][i]Damius - F[/i][/b][i]ollower Mod.[/i][/center]


[b][u]Version 1.1 released + vanilla hair version[/u] ! [/b]

[i][b]» FAQ [/b][/i]
* Damius is a Nord battle-worn warrior who fights fiercly for you.
* He specializes in melee combat with big 2-handed weapons and heavy armor.
* He starts at level 8 and is located at [b][i]Jorrvaskr, Whiterun.[/i][/b]
* [b][i]Essential [/i][/b] so he will not die.
* Damius starts with just a battle-axe, some ale and a torch.
* He starts with no gear so he will be naked (so beware :p).
* He trains mainly in Two-handed, Heavy armour and block. He can wear light armour too though.
* Auto-Level is enabled up to level 100.
* [b][i]Marriable.[/i][/b]



[b] » INSTALL: [/b]
- Install manually or via NMM and activate the .esp located in skyrim/data folder.
- [size=4] Load the mod's .ESP file BELOW [b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO[/url] / any other such mod[/b] in NMM/Launcher to avoid issues. [/size]
- Overwrite if asked, in case of upgrading.


[b] » REQUIREMENTS:[/b]
- Skyrim 1.5+
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168] Apachii SkyHair. (Not needed for vanilla version obviously)[/url]


[b] » RECOMMENDED MODS FOR SAME LOOK:[/b]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488]Better Males (Nudes - FavoredSoulMeshes)[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4141] HighRes Face Maps for Men.[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23]I Wash[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes of Beauty.[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]Optional Hair Colours for ApachiiSkyHair.[/url]


[b] » OPTIONAL MODS: [/b]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO.[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18202]An ENB like Enhanced Motion Picture.[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13049]Imaginator - for a more colourful experience.[/url]

[i]
CHANGE LOG;
v1.1
- Added a vanilla hair option.
- Buffed speed to 110.
- Moved him to Jorrvaskr.
- Removed .BSA file to make it more compatible.

v1.0
- Initial release version.
[/i]

[b] » Problems? Try this: [/b]
- Check your load-order is correct, below UFO or any other follower/companion mod.
- Open console and input "help damius 4" if you lost/can't find him, then enter "player.placeatme "ID-number" .
- Look if you have bEnableFileSelection=1 in your SkyrimPrefs.ini file under [Launcher]. It NEEDS to be added/changed for any mods to function.
- Run the game through [url=http://skse.silverlock.org/] SKSE [/url] if your using any follower mod etc.
- Incase of a dark head / discoloured head; try input SetNPCWeight "90" and SetScale "1" values into console THEN Save Game and exit, then restart game and load the save.





[center]

[b] » CHECK MY OTHER MODS:[/b]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19193]
[img]http://oi49.tinypic.com/30dcivr.jpg[/img]
Laluna - Mage Follower.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18505]
[img]http://oi49.tinypic.com/b9gfhs.jpg[/img]
Redguard Jenassa Replacer. [/url]


More images of my char's and other stuff on my profile: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2264684]Click.[/url]



________________________________________________________

Kudos to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/283148]Apachii's Hair[/url]
and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2753566] foretrenty [/url] for [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554] NPC-Editor [/url][/center]
author: timek

files.name: Damius the Merc - BSA file version
